title: LF people to queue with.
body:
As title says. I have returned to the game after a very long absence, I am not ranked, but looking to start soon, am online a lot, just looking for people to queue with rather than soloing all the time, and who can help me get back into the game and learn anything new.
I am generally well above average at vid games (top tier heroic/mythic raider in wow, competitive on CS:GO, BF4, CoD, Dota2 etc etc etc) and am not bad at league, but still relearning obviously.
Add me if keen.
